item.title: Palayan Resources Inc 10-K
item.description: Palayan Resources Inc, which is in the Gold & Silver Ores [1040] industry, SEC 10-K filing on June 28, 2022 had 10217 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: shares - 117 instances financial - 110 instances 31 - 107 instances march - 100 instances stock - 99 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
